discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The Taxonomy Manager can be used to create and edit a Taxonomy file specific to your current automation project. This Taxonomy file contains user-defined document types, organized in Groups and Categories.

questions.question_text: What is the role of the Taxonomy Manager?

choices.A: To select which extractors are trained for each document type and field.
choices.C: To select the type of ML that can be used in the project.
choices.D: To present a document processing specific user interface for validating and correcting automatic classification outputs.
choices.B: To create and edit a Taxonomy file specific to the current automation project.

choices.A: A solution for combining different approaches to extract information from workflows.
choices.D: A solution for combining different approaches to extract entities from Word documents such as contracts and agreements.
choices.B: A solution that offers the ability to digitize, extract, validate, and train data from documents.
choices.C: A solution for the processing of Excel files for extracting data tables.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Document UnderstandingTM: is a no-code and user-friendly solution that combines specialized and generative models to extract and interpret data from various documents and ensure end-to-end document processing. From structured to unstructured, the tool can process a wide variety of documents, recognizing different objects like tables, handwriting, signatures, and checkboxes, and is versatile in handling various file formats.

Selected Answer: D
Form Extractor is the correct answer.

D: Extraction with Intelligent Form Extractor is 1 per page

D is correct answer. OCR is free

questions.question_text: Which of the following consumes Page Units?

choices.D: Using Intelligent Form Extractor on a 5-page document with 0 successful extractions.
choices.B: Creation of a Document Validation Action in Action Center.
choices.C: Using ML Classifier on a 21-page document.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Importing your taxonomy
You can upload your taxonomy to the Communications Mining platform from a spreadsheet, which will automatically import all labels without having to manually add them during model training.

Step-by-step guide to import your taxonomy:

Click on the Settings page on the navigation bar
Click on ‘Labels & Entities’
Click on the + icon
Click on ‘Import Labels’
Copy-paste your labels (Parent label > Child label format) and their descriptions (if available)
Click on ‘Import’
Accessing 'Import labels' feature

questions.question_text: What should a UiPath Communications Mining taxonomy contain when it is being imported?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is correct,
You should consider using the Machine Learning Classifier if:

- Your need to classify the single documents into different document types where no splitting is required.
- The custom document types are very similar. A trained Machine Learning Classifier can differentiate more easily between two similar document types than the Intelligent Keyword Classifier.

https://docs.uipath.com/document-understanding/automation-suite/2023.4/user-guide/machine-learning-classifier

Selected Answer: A
You should consider using the Machine Learning Classifier if:
 - Your need to classify the single documents into different document types where no splitting is required.
 - The custom document types are very similar. A trained Machine Learning Classifier can differentiate more easily between two similar document types than the Intelligent Keyword Classifier.

Selected Answer: B
ML classifier is used when the document types are different and it cannot split pages

questions.question_text: In which of the following scenarios, the ML Classifier is the only recommended classifier to be used, according to best practice?

choices.D: When the custom document types are very similar and file splitting is necessary.
choices.C: When the custom document types are not similar and file splitting is necessary.
choices.B: When the custom document types are not similar and file splitting is not necessary.
choices.A: When the custom document types are very similar and file splitting is not necessary.
